name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyNdefFormatable
summary: Provide access to NDEF format operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: format
methods.summary: Format a tag as NDEF, and write a Modules.Nfc.NdefMessage.

parameters.name: message
parameters.summary: The NDEF message to write after formatting, can be null.

methods.name: formatReadOnly
methods.summary: Formats a tag as NDEF, write a Modules.Nfc.NdefMessage, and make read-only.

parameters.name: message
parameters.summary: The NDEF message to write after formatting
